com.mindfusion.common

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.common.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Externalizable
    Represents an ordered pair of integer x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane. Instances of this class are immutable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Point Empty
      Represents a point with all properties set to zero.

      Point()
      Initializes a new instance of the Point class with (0, 0) coordinates.

      Initializes a new instance of the Point class with the specified coordinates.

      Initializes a new instance of the Point class from the specified point.
